about_the_game:
Dive into the diverse world of "Intergalacto-1," where every mode offers a unique adventure! Each mode is designed for endless excitement and challenges.



In the eerie horror mode, Mystic Town: The Abyss, you'll face an invisible ghost and many magical elements. Collect clues and keys to unlock doors and escape. Everything happens for a reason, testing your wits and courage at every turn.



Warzone mode is a multiplayer arena where you can create or join servers, play with friends, and enjoy intense battles. Team up or go solo as you fight through waves of enemies and obstacles in a quest for victory.



In Battle of Lives mode, you'll collect keys by fighting guards to unlock doors that teleport you to different challenges. Some doors lead to the boss level, while others take you to zombie mode.



The ultimate challenge is facing off against the nearly unbeatable boss, INM. With only a slim chance of victory, will you dare to take on this formidable foe? Conquer INM in the Battle of Lives mode.



Finally, in zombie mode, you'll face waves of undead that become more difficult with each round. Access this mode through the doors in Battle of Lives, testing your survival skills to the limit. Fight off the relentless horde and see how long you can endure.

Embark on an epic journey through the cosmos in "Intergalacto-1," where every triumph brings you one step closer to uncovering the secrets of the universe.

In the eerie horror mode, Mystic Town: The Abyss, you'll face an invisible ghost and many magical elements. Collect clues and keys to unlock doors and escape. Everything happens for a reason, testing your wits and courage at every turn.



Warzone mode is a multiplayer arena where you can create or join servers, play with friends, and enjoy intense battles. Team up or go solo as you fight through waves of enemies and obstacles in a quest for victory.



In Battle of Lives mode, you'll collect keys by fighting guards to unlock doors that teleport you to different challenges. Some doors lead to the boss level, while others take you to zombie mode.



The ultimate challenge is facing off against the nearly unbeatable boss, INM. With only a slim chance of victory, will you dare to take on this formidable foe? Conquer INM in the Battle of Lives mode.



Finally, in zombie mode, you'll face waves of undead that become more difficult with each round. Access this mode through the doors in Battle of Lives, testing your survival skills to the limit. Fight off the relentless horde and see how long you can endure.

Embark on an epic journey through the cosmos in "Intergalacto-1," where every triumph brings you one step closer to uncovering the secrets of the universe.
name: Intergalacto-1 (Mystic town Demo)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™i5-7200U @ 2.5GHz (up to 2.7GHz) or AMD Ryzen 3 2200U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Players may need to lower the graphics settings depending on their PC's specifications to achieve optimal performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Intergalacto-1 features intense multiplayer battles in Warzone mode and thrilling survival experiences in the mystical horror mode, filled with magical elements and numerous exciting features. Can you conquer the galaxy's secrets and defeat the unbeatable boss INM?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
